enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE 39TH SESSION
sentences: On Monday morning, IPCC Secretary Renate Christ introduced the draft report of the 39th session of the IPCC (IPCC-XL/Doc.
Saudi Arabia, Venezuela and Bolivia reiterated their reservations concerning the WGIII report.
Christ explained that the Saudi Arabian and Bolivian reservations had already been attached to the IPCC-39 report, and that Venezuela's reservation would be added.
Chair Pachauri added that those reservations could also be mentioned in the IPCC-40 report.
Delegates accepted the draft report as amended.
